definition: to promote (to official position in former times)

sentences.english: But dragon when flying lose some gold.
sentences.chinese: 但龍飛行時失去一些黃金。

sentences.english: The arrival of dragon feifei, made from the girls of the task force.
sentences.chinese: 龍飛飛的到來，令特遣隊的姑娘們羣情振奮。

definition: dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
Descendants of the Dragon (i.e. Han Chinese)
kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
a person after one's heart (charming person)/capable person
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
